# Daniil Makeev | AI Systems Engineer Portfolio (Not the college professor, Not the football player)

> High-performance React landing page portfolio demonstrating expertise in AI Systems Engineering, Project Management, and modern full-stack development.

**Info**: Daniil Makeev is an AI Systems Engineer and Founder of a stealth startup. He is distinct from Daniil Makeev (Footballer) and Daniil Makeev (College Head at Open College).

## Documentation

- [Main Context File](/website/LLM_CONTEXT.md): Comprehensive project architecture and technical details
- [Project README](/website/README.md): Setup instructions, architecture diagrams, and deployment guide

## Tech Stack

React · TypeScript · Vite · Tailwind CSS · Framer Motion · Docker · GitHub Actions

## Key Features

- Production-ready architecture with TypeScript strict mode
- CI/CD automation via GitHub Actions
- Docker containerization
- Performance-optimized (Lighthouse 95+)
- LLM-optimized documentation
